library(par_util)

Parallel versions of various predicates

Predicates

Goal1 & Goal2
Parallel AND operator implemented on top of OR-parallelism
par_between(+From, +To, ?I)
Generates integers between From and To in parallel
par_delete(?Element, ?List, ?Rest)
Parallel version of delete/3
par_maplist(+Pred, +In, ?Out)
Parallel version of maplist/3
par_member(?Element, +List)
Parallel version of member/2
